channel.title: [Need Help] 317 Delta with Galkon Client
channel.description:
I'm not familiar with stuff when it comes to clients so
I downloaded a clean delta source w/ its own client and that works fine, but I want to make my own client so I decided to use Galkon's Refactored client as a base to start off with.
The problem is, is that I can't log onto my server with the Galkon client because when I try to log on it just says "error connecting to server" in the login box Can anyone help me with this?

item.title: [Need Help] 317 Delta with Galkon Client
item.dc:creator: @lolofing_200 lolofing 200
item.description:
@lolofing_200 wrote:

no because you client has to be compatible with the source.

Read full topic
